January Term 2015    Spring 2015     Summer 2015      Fall 2015       Registration Calendar Archive      Print View                                    Registration Calendar           January Term 2015                                                 Display of the January Term 2015 Schedule of Classes January 2015 term classes will be available in the Course Search feature of Albert beginning the week of September 29, 2014   Registration Status Students will be able to view their Registration Status for the January term using the Student Center on Albert beginning the week of September 29, 2014   Refund Schedule The refund schedule for the current academic year can be found in the Refund Schedule section of the Office of the Bursar's website     Withdrawal Schedule A grade of 'W' will be issued beginning the 4th calendar day of the session   Monday, October 20, 2014 January term Registration begins at 9:00am Eastern Daylight Time for most undergraduate, graduate, and diploma students   Tuesday, December 9, 2014 The January term tuition payment is due   Saturday, December 20, 2014 - Sunday, January 4, 2015 Student Winter Recess   No classes scheduled   Wednesday, December 24, 2014 - Sunday, January 4, 2015 Winter Recess for University Offices  The University, including the Office of the University Registrar, will be closed from Wednesday, December 24, 2014 through Sunday, January 4, 2015. During this period requests for paper transcripts and enrollment certifications will not be processed.   Sunday, January 4, 2015 Last day for all students to use Albert to add or drop January term classes   Sunday, January 4, 2015 Last day of active waitlists   Monday, January 5, 2015 January Term 2015 classes begin   Monday, January 5, 2015 The University reopens   Monday, January 5, 2015 Waitlists will be purged   Monday, January 5, 2015 All registration transactions (initial registration, dropping a class, adding a class) must be processed at the Student Services Center . Please note that prior approval/authorization from your academic advisor, Department or the Dean of your college may be required.   Monday, January 5, 2015 Last day to drop a class and receive a refund of 100% of tuition   Wednesday, January 7, 2015 The last day to drop a class without the issuance of a 'W' grade   Thursday, January 8, 2015 A grade of 'W' will be issued for students who drop a class or withdraw for the term   Monday, January 19, 2015 Martin Luther King, Jr. Day No classes scheduled / University Holiday   Friday, January 23, 2015 Last day of January Term 2015 classes  Return to top of page                           Registration Calendar           Spring 2015                                                 Display of the Spring 2015 Schedule of Classes The spring 2015 schedule of classes will be available in the Course Search feature of Albert beginning the week of October 13, 2014   Registration Status During the week of October 13, 2014 you will be able to access Registration Status information in the Student Center on Albert. You will be able to obtain the date and time that you will initially be able to enroll for spring 2015 classes, check if you require advisor clearance prior to registration, and view any negative service indicators (holds) that will prevent you from enrolling at your appointed registration date/time.   Refund Schedule The refund schedule for the current academic year can be found in the Refund Schedule section of the Office of the Bursar's website     Withdrawal Schedule The Fall / Spring Withdrawal Schedule displays when a grade of 'W' will be issued as the issuance date is based on the number of weeks in the session.
